captions.text: *piano*
WOMAN: Don't you just kinda wanna squeeze it? MAN: Absolutely.
You know whenever I see something cute in front of me, I kind of just imagine myself, like *yelp*. Yeah, that's why I can't hold babies.
Hey guys, I'll be right back. Watch the bunny?
WOMAN: Or you know that thing when you're walking down the sidewalk and a bus is coming?
MAN: And you just feel like your body is just going to take over and just fling yourself into the street? WOMAN: Yeah, kablewie. MAN: Yeah, absolutely.
Or like, sometimes, when you're with somebody and you don't even have to be pissed off at them or anything, but you're just like... what would happen if I just ...
WOMAN: Punched them in their stupid little fucking face. MAN: Yeah! Or like, just spit, not even because of something said.
They're just like, "Chris, you want a cup of coffee..." SPIT!
Yeah, I get that. I also get that.. cigarettes, I kinda just wanna  like, put them out on people. For no reason.
Mine doesn't always have to be negative, though. Sometimes it's just like, what would happen if I kiss this person right now?
WOMAN: Like, not right now. MAN: No, no, not right now. I don't even have to be like, attracted to them. WOMAN: Mm hm.
Ooh! I got another one. Super relatable, kinda fucked up though.
You know, when you like, fantasize about your best friend dying? So you can like, take care of their significant other? MAN: *whispers* If I die, finger Anne.
Noo...
No, yeah, me neither.
Oh! Sometimes, when I'm in a club, or any place with music really, I just like, I feel like I'm going to get into a...
TOGETHER: Dance battle! YEAH!!
But then I'll take it one step further, like, people who have wronged me are there.
MAN: And like, my high school bullies. WOMAN: And like, all my ex-girlfriends. MAN: That guy, who I spit in his face earlier, that guys there.
MAN: I got one that's, uh, kind of a classic. WOMAN: Yeah, totally hit me.
Engineering a situation so that your crush, or your love, is in immense danger and you kinda just have to save the day.
MAN: Cause, ya know, live or die, you're a hero. WOMAN: You're Bruce Willis, yeah. MAN: *whispers* If I die, finger Anne.
ANNE: What are you guys talking about?
WOMAN: Just... Dawson's Creek. MAN: Uhh, just, the origin of uh... WOMAN: The finale.
ANNE: Ohh, don't you just wanna squeeze him?
BOTH: Noo.. WOMAN: Weird... MAN: Psycho...
*whistling and upbeat music*

title: 9 Psychopathic Thoughts You Have But Don't Admit

comments.text: im way more edgy﻿

comments.text: kid thoughts﻿
comments.author: edt

comments.text:
I hav a grenade paper weight (its a real grenade without the stuff that 
makes it blow up), an every now an then when i hav people over (an they 
dont know about it) i show it to them, pull the pin out, an toss it as i 
turn the lights off. Its dark when it hits the floor an the panic my guests 
are in is just hilarious. Its funny because im not really threatening 
anyones well-being. In that situation, the person to worry about is the one 
that asks when is goin to blow up...﻿
comments.author: Rjay David

comments.text:
Have you ever walked into a bank and wondered how you would rob it, and how 
it would turn out? 
Same with all stores, a corner store would probably be the easiest. 
Or how you would kill someone but make it look like an accident? 


These guys get me﻿
comments.author: J4GG1D_3DG3

comments.author: Bea Mathers

comments.text: +Bea Mathers anyone who could tell me wtf is going on????
comments.author: Bea Mathers

comments.text:
When Im on a train and its really crowded i have this vivid vision of 
slaughtering everyone in the carriage with me
I feel that life has no meaning and we are all just animals walking around, 
with these delusions that goals and aspirations actually exist, when in 
reality, theres no point.
I also feel like I am in the wrong body and I am outside of myself most of 
the time.
I think that I am more intelligent then a lot of people and that there is 
no need for weak, stupid people who do not question anything at all.
on the other hand, I have an extremely low self esteem and really bad 
suicidal thoughts all the time.
I have been diagnosed with bipolar, major depression, ADHD and anxiety, but 
I feel like I may be a sociopath??? Anyone who knows the symptoms and/or is 
a sociopath that could help me out?? Thanks.﻿
comments.author: Bea Mathers

comments.text:
Sometimes i fantasize about me dying or going into a coma and i think about 
my friends' reactions to the event,it makes me feel happy for some reason.﻿

comments.text:

those fucked up things that pop into our heads.﻿

OH MY GOD! I'm not a psychopath but the punching someone in the face thing 
totally applies to me. I'll just be standing there talking to someone and 
all the sudden I start wondering what would happen if I punched them in the 
face/insulted them really badly/spit in their face.... like, I make myself 
uncomfortable sometimes when I think about it. I mean, why would I think 
about punching someone in the face when we're talking about something happy 
we have in common like the Avengers or something? And whenever I imagine 
what they would do I feel like they would be 100% hurt and would never talk 
to me again. Maybe I am psychopath...... Oh well.  ¯\*(ツ)*/¯﻿
